verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: The same day] [R-ARGM-TMP: that] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: suggested] [ARG1: taking away press credentials from certain members of the media] , the White House defended its commitment to a free press .

The same day that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] suggested [V: taking] away [ARG1: press credentials] [ARG2: from certain members of the media] , the White House defended its commitment to a free press .
